primary.request: Book two weeks at Bonaventure resort
primary.context: Caller is frustrated about losing weeks and previous call drops
primary.detail: The AI identified the request as a reservation booking which it cannot perform and transferred the caller to concierge.

secondary.context: Caller mentioned being thrown off the website
secondary.detail: The caller initially mentioned website issues but focused on the reservation request; the call was transferred for the reservation before the portal issue was addressed.

steps: Caller expressed frustration and requested a human agent due to previous call drops.
AI offered a 20-minute wait for a human or the automated system; caller chose automated.
AI performed account lookup and verification.
Caller requested a reservation for two weeks in January 2027.
AI clarified dates and contract details.
Caller requested to pay and book the unit.
AI explained it cannot book units and transferred the caller to concierge.

clarifications.note: AI did not find Bonaventure contract

corrections.note: User corrected check-in date to Sunday

insights.summary: The caller was highly frustrated due to previous call drops and wanted to book a reservation for 2027. The AI successfully verified the account and clarified the dates but correctly transferred the call as it cannot process bookings.
insights.verbatim: I'm gonna lose two weeks, and nobody's helping me. And you've thrown me off your website, you, Jamie, have hung up on me four times now.
